EmailTemplate.name: Before 2 days project completion date send mail to manager
EmailTemplate.subject: Project Management: Your project will be finished within two days
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!EMS_TM_Project__c.Project_Manager__c},
The project {!EMS_TM_Project__c.Name} is nearing completion with the end date on {!EMS_TM_Project__c.EMS_TM_EndDate__c}. Please change the end date of the project to extend it, if required. In case there is no extension, then make sure to change the status of the project to 'Completed' on the end date so that the associated assignments are closed. You can find the project record here.
Regards,
The Cloud Peritus Team
